replies.ask_name: Could you give me your name, please?
replies.apartment_ask_apartment_name: What apartment are you interested in?
replies.apartment_ask_day: What day would you like to make the booking for?
replies.apartment_ask_start_time: When would you like the viewing to start?
replies.apartment_ask_application_fee_paid: Have you already paid the application fee for the apartment?
replies.apartment_ask_custom_message: Would you like to add a message for the letting agency?
replies.apartment_inform_viewing_unavailable: I am sorry, but there is no viewing available at your preferred time.
replies.apartment_inform_viewing_available: Great, there is still a viewing available at that time. Would you like me to book it for you?
replies.apartment_inform_booking_successful: Excellent, the booking is done for you!
replies.apartment_inform_nothing_found: Unfortunately there are no apartments that match your search. Would you like to change any of your criteria?
replies.anything_else: Is there anything else that I can do for you?
replies.out_of_scope: I am sorry, I don't quite understand what you mean. I am only able to help you book apartment viewings.
